territory, teritoryo.tweet_text:
Para tayong nagiging foreigner sa sarili nating teritoryo. Mar Roxas will be the one to defend the rights of fisherfolks, farmers, and ordinary Filipinos against China. 

#BisayaMovement
territory, teritoryo.tweet_text2: For us to become a foreigner in our own territory. Mar Roxas will be the one to defend the rights of fisherfolks, farmers, and ordinary Filipinos against China.
